text: David Lloyd Johnston, CC CMM COM CD FRSC(hon) (born June 28, 1941) is a Canadian academic and author. He was the Governor General of Canada from October 1, 2010 to October 2, 2017. ==Style and titles== * June 28, 1941– October 1, 2010: Mister David Lloyd Johnston * October 1, 2010–: His Excellency the Right Honourable David Lloyd Johnston, Governor General and Commander-in-Chief in and over Canada The Governor General's style and title in full is, in , and in . == Career == Before becoming he Governor General of Canada Johnston was the president of the University of Waterloo and a tenured faculty member in the school of computer science. == References == Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Academics of the University of Waterloo Category:Governors-general of Canada Category:Order of Canada Category:People from Greater Sudbury Category:Writers from Ontario
title: David Johnston
